question.question: Which of the following is a primary indication for hospitalisation in cases of suicidal risk?
question.option_a: To stabilise a patient with a life-threatening prognosis due to the non-psychiatric complications of suicide
question.option_b: To provide long-term psychotherapy to prevent future suicidal thoughts
question.option_c: To treat the associated psychiatric disorder without immediate suicidal risk
question.option_d: To facilitate resolution of the crisis by setting up supportive psychotherapy
